user_query: My friend is an art lover and I want to surprise her with some unique NFTs. Can you provide me with the metadata, attributes, and media of popular art-related NFTs? Additionally, find me the current market performance and competition of her favorite art company. Thanks!

TaskList.description: Fetch metadata, attributes, and media of popular art-related NFTs.
Retrieve current market performance data for the specified art company.
Analyze competition for the specified art company.
